devdoc.author: Dire_0x (github.com/dire-0x)
devdoc.details: A generic proxy contract which extracts a fee before delegation

constructor.details: Construct this contract and specify a fee beneficiary, 0x proxy contract address, and allowance target

getFunctionImplementation(bytes4).details: Get function implementation address based on signature

optimalSwap(bytes,address,uint256).details: Delegates calls to the specified implementation contract and extracts a fee based on provided arguments

params.fee: Fee amount collected and sent to the beneficiary
params.feeToken: The ERC20 we wish to extract a user fee from. If this is ETH it should be the standard 0xeee ETH address
params.msgData: The byte data representing a swap using the original ZeroEx contract. This is either recieved from the 0x API directly or we construct it in order to perform a Uniswap trade

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiedSwap(bytes,address,address,uint25.details: Forwards calls to the zeroEx contract and extracts a fee based on provided arguments

params.fee: Fee amount collected and sent to the beneficiary
params.feeToken: The ERC20 we wish to extract a user fee from. If this is ETH it should be the standard 0xeee ETH address
params.inputToken: The ERC20 the user is selling. If this is ETH it should be the standard 0xeee ETH address
params.msgData: The byte data representing a swap using the original ZeroEx contract. This is either recieved from the 0x API directly or we construct it in order to perform a Uniswap trade
params.outputToken: The ERC20 the user is buying. If this is ETH it should be the standard 0xeee ETH address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAllowanceTarget(address).details: Set a new new allowance target address

setZeroEx(address).details: Set a new 0x proxy contract address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: mistX proxy contract for 0x proxy
